otherMat.labl: GC Historial Database Project Agriculture Part 1.xlsx
otherMat.txt: Comparison of Agriculture and Agri-Foods Canada databases listed in Depository Services Program's 2005 Supplemental Checklist (Canadian federal government databases accessible through the Internet) with web content from 2016. Contributed by a graduate student enrolled in LIS 598: Introduction to Government Information, Winter 2016, School of Library and Information Studies, University of Alberta.

otherMat.labl: GC Historical Database Project Dept List Aug 2016.xlsx
otherMat.txt: List of Government of Canada departments and agencies included on Depository Services Program's Supplemental Checklist: Canadian federal government databases accessible through the Internet. Shows when content from 2005 databases were compared to current web content.

Contributed by Tomasz Mrozewski, Data, GIS and Government Documents Librarian, Laurentian University.
Use this file as a template for gathering information about databases available via historical web sites.
